application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details Required by Condition 3 (External Materials) of permission 24/01474/HOU (Conversion of an existing garage into a habitable space. Erection of a two-storey rear extension and replacement of existing dual pitched roof with a mono pitched roof and installation of solar panels. Replacement of existing single storey flat roof with a mono pitched roof and installation of 3nos rooflights. Alteration to the external materials and fenestration of the dwelling together with associated landscaping works. Erection of single storey rear outbuildings for garden storage and summer room.)
